fields.text: i love all of these restaurants so much. GOD cracker barrel gets me going mmmm
mrmanager had a wonderful time at banff
uhmmm i just wanted to comment for fun idk anything lolll
the ghosts yearn, not unlike the way i do. i am chad yearning.
I absolutely despise all of these... these establishments. Hellish. Despicable. Inedible. Awful in every context, by all and any miniscule comphrensible scale. Heinous.

ohhhmygod i hadsuch a good time here it was so much thjepark was amazingthe boutiques were a DELIGHT and all the wildlifeee i felt so in love and in tune with nature and myself i love you banff forever and always
